entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 03:21 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
